title: censiswallet
author: censiswallet
content: What is Censis Wallet?Trust and Security are at the heart of everything we build Censis users will be the sole owner and controller of their assets. In other words, no third party entity may seize, freeze, use or access user assets.Â Today, non-custodial and decentralized finance is too complex for your average consumer. Censis offers the full Web3 Bep20 financial ecosystem, solving the complexity of money movement on Web3: a wallet for everything on Web3. Users can easily Transfer and manage multiple Bep20 Crypto Tokens.Assets InformationCensis wallet is for binance BEP20 token based wallet. User can store thair BNB and BEP20 based custom token to wallet. Wallet application is developed using web3 java for read and write transactionTransferFreely transfer in and out assets through QR code, contacts or just paste the address. And check out the transactions by viewing the real data on the chain.Offline SignatureThe hot wallet is used as an observation wallet and has access to the Internet, but does not have private keys. The cold wallet isolates the network and signs offline via QR code.SwapExchange your tokens directly from your mobile wallet. The swap feature combines data from decentralized exchange aggregators, market makers, and DEXs to ensure you get the best price with the lowest network fees. To download the "Censis Wallet" mobile application from the Google Play Store, you can use the following link:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ubrain.censiswallet&pli=1This link will take you to the application's page on the Play Store where you can download and install the app on your mobile device.The official website: https://censiswallet/Twitter: https://twitter.com/censiswalletTelegram: https://t.me/censiswalletMedium: https://censiswallet.medium.com/LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/censiswallet/GitHub: https://github.com/censisdev

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Hi, is it possible if you can provide more pictures of your team under this project? I have noticed that under Censis Team, three (3) photos were posted but you failed to provide for their respective names. In addition, I am 80% sure that at least one or two of these people are AI generated photos due to the overall outlook, layout, imbalances, and disproportion angles they contain.Check the reference below: FIRST PICTURE:The collar of the shirt is not the same- as you can see there is a black line on the right side as opposed to none on the left side. Glasses are a bit off which looks like it was placed unnaturally. SECOND PICTURE:Teeth are not proportionate and there are like hair particles on his bonnet. THIRD PICTURE:This one somehow looks natural but I still have my doubts since there are hair particles everywhere.**Take this with a grain of salt but you are required to at least show further pictures and proof of their identity. Failure to provide otherwise will compel me to create a scam accusation against this project as this constitute prima facie evidence of false advertising. If anyone could also check the veracity and identity of these pictures, please do so.

comments.author: censiswallet
comments.body: You're right it's normal to perceive everything as artificial intelligence as the types and fields of use of AI have increased. You can contact us anytime if you want, and we can verify your identity. We'd like to mention that we'll be doing an Ask Me Anything, and you're welcome to join. We'd be proud to have you.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: There are some red flags about this project, the website link provided here is not going, the Twitter page was created in 2009, seems like a bought account, Identical tweets, and can't find anyone mentioning or tweeting about the project except from the team. Nothing about the time members. This is a wallet application you want people to keep their funds and nothing about the team info. I will not download the app talkless of using the app

comments.author: JamesBorn
comments.body: It's difficult to find any meaningful thing on the team. The censis wallet is not active here it looks outdated or something and that will be troubling if someone eventually download and use it, money will hang. OP, should do proper findings as regarding to what to feed the public especially investment and wallets.
